title: The Human nervous system
creator_credit: John McDonald, Robert Churchill and Churchill Films
brief_description: Shows the differences and similarities between simple animals and humans to explain the role of the nervous system. Also studies the structure of the brain and its complexity. Suitable for secondary level.
